content.description: While active - Makes enemies you kill drop gold. Picking up Gold Coins and Coin Bags extends the duration of Gold Fever. The longer a gold fever lasts, the harder it is to maintain.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value:
Starts after picking up a **Gilded Clover**
Starts after picking up gold bags with the **XV Disco of Gold** arcana.

content.title: Gold Fever
